outputs.output_descr: The project aims to contribute to poverty alleviation and improved social development in Jordan through upgrading the basic social statistical framework provided by the Department of Statistics (DOS). This will be achieved through improving the systems and data used to monitor social and poverty indicators; developing the mechanisms of production and dissemination of statistics; strengthening established data collection mechanisms and reporting systems; and the provision of relevant, updated, and user-friendly data for poverty monitoring in a format that makes it suitable for policy making by relevant parties. The project will also enhance the skills of DOS's staff in the collection and dissemination of social indicators.

project_descr: Strengthening social and poverty statistics in Jordan
project_title: Strengthening Social and Poverty Statistics in DOS
